about-me.text: I have a strong passion for programming and a particular interest in modern web technologies. New challenges motivate me to continuously expand my knowledge and grow professionally. I am distinguished by my structured approach, strong planning skills, and solution-oriented mindset. Continuous learning is a key part of my professional development.

skills.text: I am always happy to learn new technologies,just tell me what you need.

join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

sharkie.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

polloLoco.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

teamplayer.h4: Need a teamplayer? Here what my colleagues said about me
teamplayer.h4-resp: Here what my colleagues said about me

feedback1.personalFeedbacks: Marcus had to develop, format and deliver content in collaboration with the team members.He is a reliable and friendly person.

feedback2.personalFeedbacks: He is a trustworthy teamplayer and can cope with the stress of deadlines. Structured work and clear code.

feedback3.personalFeedbacks: He is a reliable and friendly person. Work in a structured way and write a clear code. I recommend him as a colleague.

contact.text: I look forward to connecting with you and learning more about potential projects. As a dedicated Frontend Web Developer, I am particularly interested in roles where I can help create modern, user-friendly interfaces.
contact.name: Your Name
contact.agree: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
